website_summaries.verdict: Portable and serves as a no-excuse mat that can enhance current workout routines.
pros: We love that you can take this mat anywhere and also incorporate with various workouts including CrossFit, bootcamps, and yoga
High marks for the strong grip that maintains stability during the workout
cons: Has a bit of a foam odor

customer_reviews.title: Firm, and more suitable for larger torsos.
customer_reviews.text: It is definitely firmer than the original abmat (without necessarily being hard). This one feels more like it's made for a taller larger torso, but I'm a 5-foot girl, so it's not quite comfortable. It doesn't have one end significantly thicker then the other end, so it's a little bit less comfortable. Overall though, it serves the same purpose and it's not bad. The quality feels good. I just definitely think it's made for larger torsos, and it definitely won't collapse under the weight of a heavier body.
customer_reviews.author: santapookie1

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality and much Cheaper than the Name Brand Counterpart
customer_reviews.text: Works just as well as the name brand Ab-Mat. No gripes, here's the breakdown: Pros: Feels exactly like it's more expensive counterpart--Ab-Mat. Good grip on the bottom. I use mine on a rubber horse-stall mat in my garage and it never moves. Cons: None Bottom Line: This is a great ab exercise mat for a fraction of the cost of getting the real Ab-Mat. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: 2016Williams

customer_reviews.title: Love/Hate this thing!!
customer_reviews.text: I had no idea what I was missing out on before using this. This almost doubles the difficulty of a regular sit up. So sore the next day in the best way! I am a personal trainer and my clients love/hate this thing. They tell me it is much easier on the lower back as well. Great results, very fast!
customer_reviews.author: JanetSnakehole

customer_reviews.title: Definitely "high density"
customer_reviews.text: Product seems to be well constructed. My only complaint is the same as many of the other critical reviews -- it's too hard. The ab mat I used at our CrossFit gym had a lot more give. This one is like doing sit ups on a hard floor with an arch. Just did 100 sit-ups on it -- the sit-ups might even be easier than the cushier model, but it wasn't very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Imy

customer_reviews.title: Quality abdominal pad
customer_reviews.text: Quality abdominal pad but even better head pad for handstand push-ups. This thing is very well made and better priced then most competitors.
customer_reviews.author: Jason A Rose

customer_reviews.title: Abs, Yoga, Back Support
customer_reviews.text: Good item. It has a foam odor so be aware if you are sensitive. I use it for doing bicycle ab exercises, for yoga inversion support and to just lay on to relax my back. I had very good luck with the foam roller from Prosource so I decided to try this out. The odor and heat from the foam would normally warrant a return but this provides very good support and I think many of you will like it. Just for the back support it is worth owning. Just throw a towel on it if it gets too hot.
customer_reviews.author: VitaTTop Contributor: Sunglasses

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: It arrived fast and packaged well. It has the right amount of firmness. My lower back gets a good stretch while performing crunches and sit ups. It's also very affordable compared with similar brands. I'm very satisfied with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Yvette Marie Clark

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Product was as expected. It was on back order initially. I kept it in my cart to watch the price as I thought it was way too expensive to start with given everyone trying to amp up their home gyms. Finally ordered and it is a great abmat
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Nail

customer_reviews.title: Firm core even with back issues
customer_reviews.text: I have bad lower back issues, and I consequently rarely did crunches/sit-ups until I bought this! Now my core is as solid as a slab of cement, and it's almost like it's made me a more confident person. This sounds like a sell of this thing, but I'm just being honest.
customer_reviews.author: Matt B

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Was introduced to the original Ab-Mat at a Crossfit gym and loved it so figured I'd save a few bucks going with the ProSource. It's a decent product and good for the price, but it IS a slight bit different from the Ab-Mat, if that's what you're used to. The ProSource is a bit taller & stiffer ["That's what she said..." ;) ] than the Ab-Mat. The extra height ads a good stretch to your back and then you don't notice it after a while. If I were to buy another I'd get the original, but this is a good copycat though.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Ash

customer_reviews.title: Way too stiff
customer_reviews.text: I like a stiff ab mat, but this one was ridiculous. I had to return it. Hurt my back to use it for sit ups. I even tried using it as a seat cushion to see if I could soften it up. No love.
customer_reviews.author: T. Williams

customer_reviews.title: too big
customer_reviews.text: Should of listen to the reviews. I bought two of these, neither my boyfriend nor I can use them as they are too full. I thought about parking my car on them to see if that will help.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Works just as great as any high priced brand at half the price
customer_reviews.text: Love this product!!! I've had it for months and have been using it in the gym for my workouts. It provides great back support when doing sit-ups. I've also used it as support under my head when attempting head stands. The material is great and can be easily cleaned off by simply wiping it down. It does the job the same as any of the name-brands.
customer_reviews.author: FitTech

customer_reviews.title: very good product
customer_reviews.text: Very good product, this is a well made product!!!! This one tends to be on the more hard side which is what I like in an ab mat!!!!
customer_reviews.author: James Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Too firm
customer_reviews.text: Perfect shape, except it is way too firm. There is no give in it at all. After using it for sit ups my whole back was sore and achy for a few days. I wish I could return it but I ruined it trying to squish it down by parking my car on top of it. Fyi... it’s still too firm
customer_reviews.author: Stacie

customer_reviews.title: A little stiffer than the original, but great price!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this abmat instead of the original to save some money. Seems a little stiff but hopefully it breaks in a bit. so far so good!
customer_reviews.author: PHuh

customer_reviews.title: it was a great price when I bought it and is well constructed ...
customer_reviews.text: If you've ever used an ab mat, this is a totally normal one. it was a great price when I bought it and is well constructed and durable, as well as comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Cabe Cox

customer_reviews.title: Great support
customer_reviews.text: Great support for your back when doing sit-ups. Used this when I was doing cross-fit, trainer recommended I use this as well when I do sit-ups when not working out with him. Good cushion. Looks exactly like the photo.
customer_reviews.author: Xiomara Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Great for sit ups or just stretching out your back
customer_reviews.text: Just like the ones used in cross fit. Now we can do some of the workout options at home.
customer_reviews.author: RideUtah

customer_reviews.title: Same as ABmat
customer_reviews.text: Using two of them as deadlift crash pads in my apartment. They are shaped exactly like my full price Abmat. Color is true to pictures
customer_reviews.author: Kevlar

customer_reviews.title: Durable and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I still have this, protect for the impact and its comfortable for your neck and head.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this...
customer_reviews.text: This is not good. I bought it a long time back but after six months or so I could no longer use it because of nails sticking out. Then I bought the original AbMat and have been happy ever since. Pay more for a better product.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Now I can do crunches again
customer_reviews.text: I actually purchased this to use for supporting my head and shoulders while doing crunches (trainer suggested this) due to weakness in neck and shoulder muscles. It's been fabulous
customer_reviews.author: Tiggrrl66

customer_reviews.title: BE VERY CAREFUL opening box
customer_reviews.text: This looks to be a good quality mat that will last. Sadly, even though I was consciously trying to cut only the tape, I cut the mat while opening the box. Now I have a great looking mat with a slice across.
customer_reviews.author: dontlietome

customer_reviews.title: Great for back problems!
customer_reviews.text: Great Abmat!!! I had lower back surgery in January and I can do sit ups with this! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Myra

customer_reviews.title: Great support
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this mat because my core is very weak and as I started doing various versions of sit-ups I discovered I needed a little help propping myself up so that I didn't put too much strain on my back and/or neck until I could develop some core muscles. I read online that a mat like this would help, but I was skeptical. But it works! I find it's better than a foam tube or a rolled up towel. I'm using it along with the Xbox YourShape ab workouts.
customer_reviews.author: The Dabbling Mum

customer_reviews.title: Get one. Use it.
customer_reviews.text: Not as good of a contour as the Rogue product but does what it's intended to do at 1/3 of the price. Will increase ROM during ab work and might make you a little sore, LOL.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Krasco

customer_reviews.title: Just like the ones at the gym
customer_reviews.text: At this price point, I was worried it would be a step down from the ones we have at the gym -- but no, these are just as stiff as the ones I love at the gym. That was was my main criterion --- very stiff foam, and this thing has it.
customer_reviews.author: A. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Gives you FULL range of motion.
customer_reviews.text: This mat will give you FULL range of motion while doing a situp. I'm still sore lol! Seems to be well built. I'll see if it'll stand the test of time
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: great price
customer_reviews.text: This item was reasonably priced and like all ab mats I have seen gets the job done well
customer_reviews.author: RM

customer_reviews.title: nice, but rock hard at first
customer_reviews.text: great pad but rock hard. I wish they could be broken in at some point
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: Holy smokes...even after almost a year of this (I think I missed the return window) its still like a brick. #myneckandmyback Opened the box, which looked fine, to find a big gouge in the product.
customer_reviews.author: joweber77

customer_reviews.title: Nice exercise prop
customer_reviews.text: I usually do not like using props for exercise purposes but this is great for better rom and padding.
customer_reviews.author: j guinn

customer_reviews.title: Same as the one I use at Crossfit
customer_reviews.text: Great. Same one I use at my crossfit class (the box).
customer_reviews.author: Havefaith88

customer_reviews.title: A must for sit ups!
customer_reviews.text: This helped my back a lot while doing sit ups! Definitely a must for an exercises.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Yun

customer_reviews.title: Too hard and vinyl too thin
customer_reviews.text: Product is way to hard and the vinyl is too thin
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Way too thick. Painful to use.
customer_reviews.text: These are getting returned. They are so thick that they actually hurt my back. It’s almost impossible to perform a sit-up.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Golis

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for back support while doing situps as expected. But this product did the opposite, it actually hurt my back using it and i watched all the you-tube vids on how exactly to use it but it did no good, just not for me. I went out and bought 49.99 gold's gym bench that declines for my dumbbell butterflies and presses, and works great for declined situps w/ no back pain.
customer_reviews.author: XoReMuS

customer_reviews.title: Just like the one at my box
customer_reviews.text: Just like the one I use at my CrossFit box. Great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis H

customer_reviews.title: Just like at the gym
customer_reviews.text: My trainer uses this product for core muscle strengthening and I decided to get one for home use. It's great... excellent support and no slipping on a yoga mat.
customer_reviews.author: Fernandina kid

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: Great products! It’s the same quality and material as the big name brands for a fraction of the price!
customer_reviews.author: Kerianne

customer_reviews.title: Great ab may!
customer_reviews.text: Love this for doing my ab work! Sturdy and described perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Tegin McWilliams

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Resistant material, it helps me to get better position while I’m doing abs.
customer_reviews.author: VIVIANA MURPHY

customer_reviews.title: BEST EVER!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great mat. I can't do a sit-up without this, never been able to. I'm not sure how it makes it so much easier, but it really works. It doesn't slip or move while you are pumping out 25 sit-ups...stays in place. ProSource AB mat is a must have for your everyday AB workout!!!
customer_reviews.author: AJT

customer_reviews.title: Sit-up pad.
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Works so well with my Sit-ups. Makes the arch in the back also stretch a little.Good quality .
customer_reviews.author: thejacksoncrew

customer_reviews.title: High arch :(
customer_reviews.text: Very high arch. Not comfortable to use at all. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Walters

customer_reviews.title: WOW!
customer_reviews.text: It takes some getting use too. When using this pad it seems to make sit ups more focused to the lower core. I would recommend it. I am not an exerciser expert just a regular joe so don't bother asking me question on this product because I really don't know.
customer_reviews.author: ANTHONYTWASHINGTON

customer_reviews.title: Sit up and take notice
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable. Has worked really well for sit-ups. Glad I picked it up!
customer_reviews.author: Greg Smith

customer_reviews.title: The fabric backing is pretty loose but it shouldn't be a problem
customer_reviews.text: The fabric backing is pretty loose but it shouldn't be a problem. Otherwise this is exactly like the abmats I use at my box
customer_reviews.author: mkd0514

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: These ab mats are fantastic! They anti-slip grip on the bottom makes it easy for you to stay in one place while doing sit ups. The color is nice as well.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: This is a firm pad
customer_reviews.text: I got this pad after previously using an abmat by Rogue at my gym. Needless to say others saying this pad is firm compared to the other pad are absolutely correct. Personally I use this pad specifically for ab cable pulldowns for my knees to rest on, the firmness in that regards make it a lot less useful to me. Needless to say a pad is a pad, comparatively speaking the only difference in this and the Rogue is firmness.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This helps support back during sit ups and works great!
customer_reviews.author: Diamond

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product!! Really works. I first tried this at the gym and wasn't sure if this one would be as good as the one they used but it's better!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Too hard. Hurts your back badly.
customer_reviews.text: I use one of these at crossfit weekly. This one is too hard and hurts my back terribly. I cannot use it. I have no back problems either.
customer_reviews.author: S. Bauknight

customer_reviews.title: Too hard to do comfortable situps
customer_reviews.text: Much harder than the ones I use at the gym-- not that comfortable for situps.
customer_reviews.author: L.M.

customer_reviews.title: Not very happy.
customer_reviews.text: I means it’s really hard. I guess you get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Came fast and does the trick. Takes awhile to ...
customer_reviews.text: Came fast and does the trick. Takes awhile to get use to at first. But it does support the back ect...
customer_reviews.author: iagolfer

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with my purchase and the item arrived on time within good condition.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Real

customer_reviews.title: Super happy
customer_reviews.text: Yeah, I paid half of what the other brand costs that they have at my CrossFit gym and it's literally the exact same. It's a pad for your back and butt so you don't have to strain too much. You could use a pillow but it wound't have as much support so not as good. If you think you need it, get it. It's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: A. Forshaw

customer_reviews.title: Gym quality
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. It’s as thick as the ones in my Crossfit gym and the bottom has a nice grip so it doesn’t slide
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte H.

customer_reviews.title: Great for at home workouts
customer_reviews.text: Constantly use this ab mat and love it! I use it indoors and outdoors for workouts. Quality product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: MICO Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and stays put where you set it, molds to my lower back perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Harri Sterling

customer_reviews.title: Great item for a great price
customer_reviews.text: A similar mat is used at my Crossfit gym, hence my wanting this for my house. I'm very pleased with the mat. Using it allows less stain on my back but I still feel a nice burn the next morning as though I did a much more intense ab workout.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah S from Philadelphia

customer_reviews.title: Too Hard
customer_reviews.text: This mat is very hard. It's not soft or smoothly contoured as the Ab Mat I use at the gym. Because it's so hard, it hurts my spine. I would have returned for a refund, but missed the return window while trying to see if I can get used to it.
customer_reviews.author: KReview

customer_reviews.title: Works fine, a little bit hard
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one since I have some lumbar issues and I need extra support while doing sit-ups at home, I selected this one for the price and availability, it works fine, I have not had any problem exercising and feels quite comfortable, though I think it maybe to hard compared to others made out of foam.
customer_reviews.author: Amaury G.

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper alternative.
customer_reviews.text: I used a similar product at an exercise gym and decided I would like one at home. Without mentioning brands, this one appears to be nearly as good as the "name brand", but is cheaper. Maybe not quite as heavy duty, but I bet it will serve me for a long time with moderate use. So far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: Pomoxis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Was a gift to step son...seems to be doing well with no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: John H. Littlejohn

customer_reviews.title: Great Ab Mat
customer_reviews.text: Great ab mat. High quality. Would buy more in the future if I ever lost this one....
customer_reviews.author: User 47

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for support! I use this for my CrossFit training and so far I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: W. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Just as it looks on the pic
customer_reviews.text: Just as shown on picture and it was delivered very fast
customer_reviews.author: I leave reviews

customer_reviews.title: Love this ab mat
customer_reviews.text: I never thought this little ab mat could help so much! This really helps to support your back when doing situps. When I first used this, I thought I wouldn't get as good of an ab workout with it - quite the opposite! This mat takes the stress off your back, and really makes your abs work to get you up and down. I highly recommend this ab mat!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great abmat, great price!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great abmat, and is very standard for what is produced by other companies. The material is sturdy, the bottom has great grip, and the design is sleek. I would highly recommend buying from ProSource if you are looking for an abmat.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: It feels like its too high and hard or something
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting this to work with my exercise mat just as the ab bench in the gym and this hurts my back quite badly. It feels like its too high and hard or something. I still cant adjust it the right way to make my back not hurt. I may be using it wrong but I dont think there are many ways to use it.
customer_reviews.author: MPsAL

customer_reviews.title: Love it. It gives great back support for sit-ups
customer_reviews.text: Love it. It gives great back support for sit-ups. Only down fall is that it’s larger than expected and I’m on the shorter side of life. But still serves it’s purpose
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Lange

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Just as good a Rogue may but les than half the price
customer_reviews.author: Inkman

customer_reviews.title: Achilles Stretch
customer_reviews.text: I used this mat to stretch out my achilles tendon after a rupture and surgery, works great!
customer_reviews.author: Phillip K

customer_reviews.title: This ambit is ok. It is a lot harder ...
customer_reviews.text: This ambit is ok. It is a lot harder than I expected. Im not sure if it actually stated that when I was looking at it. I picked it because it had a lot of stars and was poised in the middle of the others. I hope it will break in a little and become little softer with use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it! For those claiming it's too hard use ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! For those claiming it's too hard use a pillow and sell your AB. It needs to be solid, if it wasn't it'll defeat it's purpose. It'll keep your back inline, I really thought it was soft! Being that I use it everyday, it still keeps it shape. I defiantly got my money's worth...very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Daul function
customer_reviews.text: I use this for a dual function, first my wife and i use it to do are ab workouts, and you can go to you tube to see the different variations for a ab workout. But I also use for lower back arch support on some of our hardwood chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Nutsman

customer_reviews.title: Quality piece of equipment.
customer_reviews.text: Super firm pad, and well made. This is exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Reid

customer_reviews.title: good quality and nicely made
customer_reviews.text: good quality and nicely made, but is is a bit high for me, could be a little flatter. I am about average height so maybe this would be better for a taller person.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Hollander

customer_reviews.title: Great product for you abs...
customer_reviews.text: The product works great. Very sturdy, and really get your abdominal engaged. I usually can do around 150 sit ups, but with this product I get around 40 sit ups and my abs is on fire.
customer_reviews.author: Tri Hoang

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and the price is great too!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 in the grey so my husband and I could have our own. These are exactly what I thought they would be from the description. Don't spend more on another brand, these are perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Kacey P

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Very hard and big, it hurts your back instead of helping. I tried to use it 3 times and couldn't bear it. If I could I would return it.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra

customer_reviews.title: Perfect copy! Good quality, identical design
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent substitute for the $30-40 version. Solid, firm foam, well put together. I have been using the "original" versions at the gym for over six months. This is for all practical purposes the same at half the price or less.
customer_reviews.author: Amateur Chef, Photographer, Handyman, Athlete

customer_reviews.title: We use these at the crossfit gym I go to ...
customer_reviews.text: We use these at the crossfit gym I go to and decided to get one for my house. It's absolutely what I expected, it just needs to be broken in a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi

customer_reviews.title: Too stiff
customer_reviews.text: Stiffer than the ones at my CrossFit gym. Not really comfortable for situps
customer_reviews.author: Jerry J. Chang

customer_reviews.title: ... sit-ups or crunches until you see stars and feel like puking. Approximately the same profile as the "name ...
customer_reviews.text: This does what it's supposed to do which is encourage you to do sit-ups or crunches until you see stars and feel like puking. Approximately the same profile as the "name brand" mat and has held up fine so far.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Whitmire

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable to use and you feel the full motion benefits ...
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable to use and you feel the full motion benefits instantly. Some instructions on how to exactly lay on it would be nice. 4 stars because exercising stinks!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Simple and useful.
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what you think it would. Protects the lower back and limits back fatigue so you can do more crunches without feeling like your lower back is going to die.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Muehlbauer

customer_reviews.title: Just like crossfit!
customer_reviews.text: We use these in crossfit and I wanted to get one for the house too. Exactly as expected. A little firmer than the ones at my gym but I assume that is from basic wear and tear.
customer_reviews.author: Meesh

customer_reviews.title: Not that great
customer_reviews.text: After using the Again Faster Ab Mat I decided to try this, the padding feels very hard and it seems higher than the other mat that I've used, it almost hurts my back when I do sit ups
customer_reviews.author: Joe716

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!!! I have a bad back and is difficult to do abs,this really helps and It give me good support.. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Good. But a little too firm and larger than other abmats I’ve used
customer_reviews.author: Vivek Kothari

customer_reviews.title: Good enough
customer_reviews.text: These are not the highest of quality in construction by any means, but our gym just needed a couple for consistent use and they have held up pretty well so far. By far least expensive i have seen and will do the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Dr Glen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This is so essential for doing my situps! Now I can do them at home, comfortably, whenever I feel like it (which is often). I just slip between my nightstand and my bed for quick reps and it is out of the way.
customer_reviews.author: Girlgeek

customer_reviews.title: Not bad but far from good
customer_reviews.text: Barely used but when I attempted to use it for my lower back it was too stiff so not really good for Lower back exercises.
customer_reviews.author: tanderson

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this mat for a few months now and I'm very happy with it. While there are better/more expensive options out there, this one works well and is a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Keith L.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for addition to home gym
customer_reviews.text: Constructed well. Works great for me (120 lbs) and equally as great for my husband (245 lbs). We have been using them for several months now and they have not had any noticeable wear and tear. Good product for a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Andi

customer_reviews.title: Great for sit-ups
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for supporting the low back when doing crunches. Make sure your bottom is on the floor. I also use to stretch my spine by relaxing higher up on board. It just the right size.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

product_meta.title: Prosource Fit Abdominal AB Exercise Mat Core Trainer - High Density
product_meta.description: ProSource ab mat is specifically designed to give you the ultimate and most effective abdominal workout. You will be able to target and isolate upper abs, lower abs, obliques, and even the lower back muscles. One size fits all. No matter if you are a beginner or pro, you can use ProSource Ab Mat. Lightweight, just over one pound, makes it easy to store or travel with. Perfect for Home, Office, Gym, Crossfit, MMA, Boxing, and for other types of training that requires a stronger abdominal core.
feature_bullets: BETTER RESULTS – Provides a full range of motion you can’t get from standard sit-ups; isolates the abs for optimal workout results
NATURAL ARCH - Arch design naturally curves to the back for more effective core work that protects your lower back
GREAT FOR CROSSFIT – Perfect for high rep exercises like crunches, sit-ups and leg lifts; Ideal for head protection during handstand push-ups
DURABLE – High-density foam gives comfort and the perfect amount of firm support for your back and spine while challenging your core muscles
DIMENSIONS - 15”L x 12”W x 2.5”H; the compact design is one-size-fits-all and portable so you can carry it to the gym or even while traveling
